sentences.sentence: There are several ways to make crankcases .
The crankcases are finished and mounted as are the crosshead guides.
sentences.translation: 完成的曲轴箱和安装的是十字头指南。

sentences.sentence: I say this because later when I machine the crankcases I take some away.
sentences.translation: 我这样说是因为后来当我机曲轴箱我的一些离开。
